hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that if Link could say a few words, he'd be a better public speaker.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Zelda's Lullaby#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Mirror Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Lens of Truth#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Dodongo's Cavern#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #Nayru's Love#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Did you know that Barinade is allergic to bananas?

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #Morpha#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Before Heavy Block Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Lens of Truth#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #5# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Sun's Song# and #Cojiro#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Kokiri Shop#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of time.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lobby Left Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Zelda's Lullaby#.
